languages.text: "Ты слишком легко забываешь о пролившейся из-за тебя крови, и слишком часто величаешь себя избранницей Императора и Его святых".

traits.locale_text: "Ты слишком легко забываешь о пролившейся из-за тебя крови, и слишком часто величаешь себя избранницей Императора и его святых".

languages.text: "Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilt because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."
languages.original_text: "Ты слишком легко забываешь о пролившейся из-за тебя крови, и слишком часто величаешь себя избранницей Императора и Его святых".

traits.locale_text: "Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilled because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."
"Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilled because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."
"Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilt because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."
"Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilt because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."
"Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilt because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."

languages.text: 「自分のせいで流れた血のことは簡単に忘れるのだな。そして自分自身が皇帝および聖者の選ばれし者であると何度も言っている」
languages.original_text: "Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilt because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."

traits.locale_text: 「自分のせいで流れた血のことは簡単に忘れるのだな。そして自分自身が皇帝および聖者の選ばれし者であると何度も言っている」

languages.text: “没想到，你这么快就忘了那些为你牺牲的人们，而且你总是喜欢自称为帝皇与圣人的神选者。”
languages.original_text: "Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilt because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."

traits.locale_text: “没想到，你这么快就忘了那些为你牺牲的人们，而且你总是喜欢自称为帝皇与圣人的神选者。”

languages.text: « Vous oubliez trop vite le sang versé par votre faute, et vous vous targuez trop souvent d'être l'élue de l'Empereur et de Ses saints. »
languages.original_text: "Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilt because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."

traits.locale_text: « Vous oubliez trop vite le sang versé par votre faute, et vous vous targuez trop souvent d'être l'élue de l'Empereur et de Ses saints. »

languages.text: «Con qué facilidad olvida la sangre que se derrama por su causa, y con qué facilidad se nombra elegida del Emperador y sus santos».
languages.original_text: "Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilt because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."

traits.locale_text: «Con qué facilidad olvida la sangre que se derrama por su causa, y con qué facilidad se nombra elegida del Emperador y sus santos».

languages.text: "Ihr vergesst zu schnell das wegen Euch vergossene Blut, und Ihr bezeichnet Euch zu häufig selbst als Auserkorene des Imperators und seiner Heiligen."
languages.original_text: "Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilt because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr vergesst zu schnell das wegen Euch vergossene Blut, und Ihr bezeichnet Euch zu häufig selbst als Auserkorene des Imperators und seiner Heiligen."

languages.text: "Senin yüzünden dökülen kanı nasıl da kolayca unutuyorsun... Kendini, İmparator'un ve azizlerinin seçilmişi olarak addetmekte de gecikmiyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Too easily do you forget the blood that is spilt because of you, and too often do you name yourself the chosen of the Emperor and His saints."

traits.locale_text: "Senin yüzünden dökülen kanı nasıl da kolayca unutuyorsun... Kendini, İmparator'un ve azizlerinin seçilmişi olarak addetmekte de gecikmiyorsun."
